title: Remember Our Unity | Guests: Garrett Graff & Tristan Harris | 9/11/20
description:
19 years after 9/11, do we recognize America any more? Osama bin Laden’s pro-Trump niece is warning Americans to wake up. The NFL season’s opening game was very preachy. A military unit saved 300 campers from the West Coast fires. “The Only Plane in the Sky” author Garrett M. Graff describes how 9/11 is fading from memory to history. Danielle Rabkin, owner of CrossFit Golden Gate in San Francisco, joins after state gyms were allowed to open, but not private ones. An op-ed claims that conservative talk radio hosts are fueling the nation’s division, but Glenn sets the record straight. But real division is coming from social media, as former Google design ethicist Tristan Harris describes in his new Netflix film, "The Social Dilemma."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
